"Oh? Greetings.":
"Ah, yes. While you're here,
please let me ask you something."

"...When you first laid eyes upon
this place, what were your thoughts?"
"I was shocked."
"It reminded me of another area."

"Indeed, as you should.
I was much the same."

"I see. I suspect that area
would be Retem's Lower Maqaad?"

"Commander Guren was the one who led
the scouting party that discovered this place."
"I was also among that party."

"\"The DOLLS don't come from the sky.
They're created somewhere here on Halpha.\""

"Those were words
left behind by Hibana..."

"I didn't think it would
appear before me like this."

"The Commander initially formed the Stia Vanguard
with the primary goal of taking this facility over."

"...By the way, did Crawford mention anything
about this area before you arrived?"
"Crawford didn't mention anything."
"They... didn't really stay in touch."
"I see..."

"Perhaps he thought it'd be quicker
if you simply saw it for yourselves."
"O-Oh... I see."

"I was rather surprised by the
sudden call from him back then..."

"Anyways, we unfortunately haven't really made
an effort to explore this place more thoroughly."

"What we do know is that
this place is a power plant."

"It appears to power the plant's core systems,
along with a DOLLS production line."

"The power plant's energy is
supplied throughout all areas of Halpha."

"Carelessly destroying the production line
could possibly affect the entire system."
"...And that's about it."

"We will continue investigating, and begin
analysis on the system's framework..."

"With hopes to gradually shut down
the plant in slow increments."
"That is our plan, at least."

"With engineers and researchers from Aelio visiting us soon,
we should finally be able to make some real progress."

"At first, we thought it would be fine to simply
destroy any DOLLS installments we came across."
"Alas, things never seem to be that easy."

"That's why it's going to take a bit more time to
fully wrest control of Stia, this plant included."

"Until such a time as completion of our mission,
we'd greatly appreciate any help you could offer."
"I look forward to working with you."
